title: Nocera on Authenticity of Insider Trading in `Billions’ (Audio)
itunes:title: Nocera on Authenticity of Insider Trading in `Billions’ (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Joe Nocera, a columnist for Bloomberg View, discusses what the hit show “Billions” gets right about insider trading on Wall Street. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
